title: Thousands of Additional Flights Canceled as Winter Storm, Omicron Surge Hurt Airlines
sub_head: Southwest, JetBlue among carriers that canceled more flights Monday as bad weather, staff shortages disrupted air travel
body:
Thousands of additional U.S. flights were canceled Monday as a winter storm and Omicron-driven staff shortages continued to disrupt air travel after the busy holiday season.
Airlines canceled more than 2,700 U.S. flights and delayed more than 3,300 flights by midday Monday, according to aviation data tracker FlightAware.
